Item: Himanshu successfully defended his Master's Thesis. Congratulations Himanshu!

Ben Kraske and John Tucker have received the [NSF GRFP award](https://www.colorado.edu/aerospace/2022/04/12/five-cu-boulder-aerospace-students-earn-major-nsf-graduate-research-fellowships). Congratulations Ben and John!
Our paper on "Gaussian Belief Trees for Chance Constrained Asymptotically Optimal Motion Planning" has been accepted for presentation at ICRA 2022.
Our paper on "Intention-Aware Navigation in Crowds with Extended-Space POMDP Planning" has been accepted for presentation at AAMAS 2022.
